attributes.action: Full recognition of Shahzad Ali , Abdul Musavir and Mohammed Haroon for there Public Services
attributes.additional_details: I believe that Shahzad Ali, Abdul Musavir and Mohammed Haroon should receive Her Majesty Highest Honours for Public Services. They were 3 Muslim men who shined brightly in the darkest hours of the London, Manchester and Birmingham Riots. Their love, compassion, dedication and bravery in Public Services have not been forgotten. I hope this epetition will provide the opportunity for the UK to urge Her Majesty the Queen to graciously bestow Her Royal favour and honour upon these 3 men.
